content:
Hey @Sean Chen (he/him) -- so if you are interested/able to work on the February lang team update --

Here are the minutes from the planning meeting, and in particular the planned schedule.

Here is an example update blog post from back when I was on top of life.

We could also really use someone to create events on the lang team calendar -- I can give you admin access!
For gathering updates from the different initiatives, should I look through the initiatives project board and see which ones have posted an update since October?
CC'ing @nikomatsakis or @Josh Triplett on :wait_one_second:Ô∏è question :smile:
In general we're trying to move (I believe) to an in-triage update from liaisons + initiative owner, rather than updates out of band -- that has not really strongly materialized as of yet though.

an in-triage update from liaisons + initiative owner, rather than updates out of band

I'm not really sure what you mean by this. What does the flow of an in-triage update look like? :smile:
Well, from a blog post perspective probably no significant difference
I think the idea is that they get reflected into initiative project boards or repositories, though, so that seems like the right place to look in general
Ok, thanks for the tip :smile:
@Sean Chen (he/him) ah, yeah, sorry, there aren't really a lot of updates for the initiatives right now
so you could just skip that part
